TextToVoice.document: This example shows you how to use TTS through API call.
TextToVoice.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tts.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: TextToVoice
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Text": "Hello World",
    "ModelType": "1",
    "Volume": "1",
    "SessionId": "session-1234",
    "Codec": "wav",
    "ProjectId": "0",
    "SampleRate": "16000",
    "PrimaryLanguage": "1",
    "Speed": "1",
    "EnableSubtitle": true
}
TextToVoice.title: Using TTS through API call
